009
010package Color_Quantization;
011
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.io.LogStream;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.ColorQuantizer;
020import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.MedianCutQuantizer;
021
022/**
023 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the {@link MedianCutQuantizer} class.
024 * 
025 * @author WB
026 * @version 2017/01/03
027 */
028public class Median_Cut_Quantization implements PlugInFilter {
029        
030        private static int NCOLORS = 16;
031        private static boolean CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = true; 
032        private static boolean CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = false;
033        private static boolean LIST_COLOR_TABLE = false;
034        
035        static {
036                LogStream.redirectSystem();
037        }
038        
039        String title;
040        
041        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
042                this.title = imp.getShortTitle();
043                return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
044        }
045        
046        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
047                //Parameters params = new Parameters();
048                
049                if (!showDialog())
050                        return;
051                
052                ColorProcessor cp = (ColorProcessor) ip;
053                
054                // create a quantizer object
055                ColorQuantizer quantizer = new MedianCutQuantizer(cp, NCOLORS);
056                int nCols = quantizer.getColorMap().length;
057                
058                if (CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE) {
059                        // quantize to an indexed color image
060                        ByteProcessor qip = quantizer.quantize(cp);
061                        ImagePlus imp = new ImagePlus(title + "-MedianCut" + nCols, qip);
062                        imp.setTypeToColor256();
063                        imp.show();
064                }
065                
066//              if (CREATE_RGB_IMAGE) {
067//                      // quantize to a full-color RGB image
068//                      int[] rgbPix = quantizer.quantize(pixels);
069//                      ColorProcessor rgbIp = new ColorProcessor(cp.getWidth(), cp.getHeight(), rgbPix);
070//                      (new ImagePlus("Quantized RGB Image (" + nCols + " colors)" , rgbIp)).show();
071//              }
072                
073                if (LIST_COLOR_TABLE) {
074                        quantizer.listColorMap();
075                }
076        }
077        
078        private boolean showDialog() {
079                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(Median_Cut_Quantization.class.getSimpleName());
080                gd.addNumericField("No. of colors (2,..,256)", NCOLORS, 0);
081                gd.addCheckbox("Create indexed color image", CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE);
082                gd.addCheckbox("Create quantized RGB image", CREATE_RGB_IMAGE);
083                gd.addCheckbox("List quantized color table", LIST_COLOR_TABLE);
084                
085                gd.showDialog();
086                if (gd.wasCanceled())
087                        return false;
088                
089                int nc = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
090                nc = Math.min(nc, 255);
091                nc = Math.max(2, nc);
092                
093                NCOLORS = nc;
094//              params.maxColors = nc;
095                CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
096                CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
097                LIST_COLOR_TABLE = gd.getNextBoolean();
098                return true;
099        }
100}
